title: Gamma Function Calculation
description: This function calculates the Gamma value for a given input X based on mathematical formulas. It utilizes two different approaches depending on the value of X to ensure better accuracy.
name: GAMMA

input.name: X
input.description: The input value for which the Gamma function is to be calculated.

output.name: GAMMA
output.description: The computed Gamma value based on the input X.

return_value.description: The result of the Gamma function calculation.
